
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18742384" title="发布于 2025-03-01 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一套基于 Material Design 规范实现的 Blazor 和 Razor 通用组件库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一套基于 <span>Material Design 规范实现的、开源（MIT license）且免费的 Blazor 和 Razor 通用组件库：MatBlazor。</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>Blazor介绍<span><br></span></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Blazor 是基于 HTML、CSS 和 C# 的现代前端 Web 框架，可帮助你更快地生成 Web 应用。使用 Blazor，你可以使用可从客户端和服务器运行的可重用组件生成 Web 应用，以便提供出色的 Web 体验。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>组件库安装</span></span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>命令安装</span></span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-sec-load-status="2"><span><code><span>Install-Package MatBlazor<span><br></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>或者</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-sec-load-status="2"><span><code><span>dotnet add package MatBlazor</span></code></span></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>NuGet包管理器安装</span></span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001600370-580721079.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>脚本引入<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>对于客户端和服务器端的Blazor项目需要将脚本部分添加到 index.html 或 _Host.cshtml（head 部分）。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&lt;script src="_content/MatBlazor/dist/matBlazor.js"<span>&gt;&lt;/script&gt;<span><br><span>&lt;link href="_content/MatBlazor/dist/matBlazor.css"<span>&nbsp;rel="stylesheet"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;</span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>组件库使用</span></span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>Button</span></span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span><span><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton OnClick="@Click"<span>&gt;Text @ButtonState&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Raised="true"<span>&gt;Raised&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Unelevated="true"<span>&gt;Unelevated&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Outlined="true"<span>&gt;Outlined&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Dense="true"<span>&gt;Dense&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @code<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; string ButtonState =&nbsp;""<span>;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; void Click(MouseEventArgs e)<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ButtonState =&nbsp;"Clicked"<span>;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001628731-1173174548.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>TreeView</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTreeView TNode="TreeNodeModel"<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;RootNode="@MyRootNode"<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;GetChildNodesCallback="@((n)=&gt;n.Nodes)"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;NodeTemplate&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @context.Name<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/NodeTemplate&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTreeView&gt;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @code<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; class TreeNodeModel<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public string Name { get;&nbsp;set<span>; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public TreeNodeModel[] Nodes { get;&nbsp;set<span>; } = new TreeNodeModel[0];<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; TreeNodeModel MyRootNode = new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>()<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Book"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Chapter 1"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Heading"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Content"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Chapter 2"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Heading"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Content"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Chapter 3"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Heading"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Content"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001653376-16858643.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Tab</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTabGroup&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab Label="First"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; First Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab Label="Second"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Second Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;LabelContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Third &lt;MatIcon Icon="@MatIconNames.Close"<span>&gt;&lt;/MatIcon&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/LabelContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ChildContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Third Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ChildContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTabGroup&gt;<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001719559-1933561676.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源代码运行<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>设置<code><span>MatBlazor.Demo</span></code><span>为启动项目运行：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001731915-870851261.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001736162-2121683655.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001740854-1496653957.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001746044-1520317282.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001751402-1638258752.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/SamProf/MatBlazor" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="wx_text_underline" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/SamProf/MatBlazor</span></a></span></span></li>

</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>

</ul>
</div>
